landing.subtitle: An interactive journey through the centuries-long history of a family that began in a mill at the foot of the Harz mountains
landing.storyHeading: From a Village Mill to Baron's Title
landing.storyExcerpt: In 1569, in a small village called Hattorf am Harz, a miller named Jacob Schwachheim began a dynasty. His ten children would face the horrors of the Thirty Years' War, achieve extraordinary educations, and lay the foundations for one of the most remarkable social ascents in Lower Saxony's history.
